snippet: The judge, Rana Bahadur Bam, had been accused of taking bribes from suspects in 2010 in exchange for light sentences.
abstract: Assailants on a motorcycle shoot and kill Nepalese Supreme Court judge, Rana Bahadur Bam, on his way to work in Katmandu; he had been accused of taking bribes from suspects in 2010 in exchange for light sentences.
lead_paragraph: The judge, Rana Bahadur Bam, had been accused of taking bribes from suspects in 2010 in exchange for light sentences.

headline.main: Nepal: Supreme Court Judge Is Killed
headline.print_headline: Nepal: Supreme Court Judge Is Killed
